short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add functionality to news.ycombinator.com and hckrnews.com

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The browser extension adds a few features to both Hacker News and hckr news:

* Highlight New Comments
* Identify New Comments on hckrnews.com
* Alexander Kirk's collapsible threads
